attributes.action: Prime Minister, do not label UK subjects as citizens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I do take exception to the current in vogue thinking regarding being called a citizen. The United Kingdom and the relevent part of the title United Kingdom is "Kingdom" means we are subjects and not citizens. To be a citizen you have to live in a country such as for example France which is of course a Republic, so Prime Minister and future Prime Ministers in case you are not aware of this fact please take notice. 

Regards

Chris Duckett
